TI: [Changes in the protein level in rat hippocampal neurons during development of the alimentary conditioned reflex under normal conditions and after treatment with iproniazid].
AB: The protein content in neurons of areas CA-1 and CA-3 of the dorsal hippocampus has been determined by means of cytointerferometry in rats during elaboration of unlocal alimentary instrumental reflex (ULAIR) and local alimentary instrumental reflex (LAIR) on the background of increased and normal serotonine content in the brain. It has been found that during the ULAIR elaboration the hippocampal neurons react by an increase of dry mass, during the LAIR elaboration-by its decrease. Under condition of serotonine excess in the brain the changes of dry mass in hippocampal neurons during elaboration of the two reflexes are opposite to these observed during the ULAIR and LAIR elaboration with normal serotonine content.
TT: Izmenenie soderzhaniia belka v neironakh gippokampa krys pri vyrabotke obshchedvigatel'nogo pishchevogo uslovnogo refleksa v norme i na fone deistviia iprazida.
TA: Nauchnye Doki Vyss Shkoly Biol Nauki
JT: Nauchnye doklady vysshei shkoly. Biologicheskie nauki
SO: Nauchnye Doki Vyss Shkoly Biol Nauki. 1987;(4):55-60.
